description: This is a React functional component named StepReview that displays a review summary of form data entered by the user. It organizes data into sections like Personal, Contact, and Preferences, providing edit links for each section and a confirmation message.

methods.name: StepReview({ formData, jumpTo, canJumpTo })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a review summary of form data with edit options.
